question.questionDesc: How many soccer players should each team have on the field at the start of each match?(by an alphanumeric character)
When Michael Jordan played for the Chicago Bulls, how many NBA Championships did he win?(by an alphanumeric character)
question.clue: The answer is between Three and Seven.
